This is the 4th part of the background information:
Consilium Partner’s Accelerator Program includes 4 key steps, and our services are: 

 

Business Evaluation: A comprehensive SWOT analysis, market research, and other key assessments to evaluate your business's current state and identify growth and cost-saving opportunities. We also help you determine your ideal future state and what success means for you. 

Strategic Planning: With expert guidance, we develop a strategic plan that outlines how to achieve your business goals and objectives, incorporating insights from the business evaluation process. 

Operational Planning: Our operational business planning process will help you structure and streamline your business operations by integrating essential technology. We also evaluate your product offerings, as well as your sales and marketing capabilities, to create a strategic channel/distribution plan that maximises your reach and impact. 

Implementation and Performance Management: Continuous progress tracking and expert performance coaching, we ensure your ongoing success. Our team monitors your progress and adjusts your strategy as needed, establishing key metrics and KPIs to consistently drive profitability. Our goal is to embed the strategic action into your daily operations, training your leaders to lead this process and elevating your business to reach its full potential. 

 \*\* The model can be wholistic where all 4 steps are incorporated or bespoke where individual steps can be used to address the gaps in the business. 

In addition to our Accelerator program, we also offer services on: 

 

Consilium Projects: Our team can help your business tackle critical issues by delivering bespoke projects tailored to your specific needs. Whether you have a burning platform or require urgent action, we'll work with you to develop a solution that maximises your results. 

Leadership and Coaching: Our experienced coaches offer personalised leadership coaching, group training sessions, and strategic planning to help you unlock your team's full potential. We also provide tailored leadership development programs to support and enhance the growth of your team.
